verses.roman:
punarapi ihāṅ tāṅra haile āgamana
eka-bāra dekhi' kari saphala nayana

synonyms: punarapi—again; ihāṅ—here; tāṅra—His; haile—when there is; āgamana—arrival; eka-bāra—once; dekhi'—seeing; kari—I make; sa-phala—fruitful; nayana—my eyes.
translation: "When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returns again, I wish to see Him just once in order to make my eyes perfect."
